Summary: shinny object floating across sky, look like big square balloon
trends: There has been one other sighting in Santa Nella Village
There was one other sighting in Santa Nella Village on or around April 16th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsdriving to work w\b hwy 152 by san luis reservior. saw a bright shiny thing floating across the sky by top of the mountain. got to the top of pacheco pass at dinosaur point and pulled over and took a picture (8 mps camara phone). couldn't get close enough to get a real good look, from the distance it appeared square to rectangular shape like a smooth trash can. it was approx 7am in the morning, clear early morning day, no fog, clear with high clouds. as i continued to work, i noticed several other vehicles stop look at the sky and taking pictures. i could see the object any more as i drove down the hill.
